Provo.L. Tom Perry Special Collections Library: The L. Tom Perry Special Collections Library is the rare book and manuscript library at Brigham Young University (BYU) in Provo, Utah. Founded in 1957 with 1,000 books and 50 manuscript collections, today it contains over 300,000 books, 11,000 manuscript collections, and over 2.5 million photographs. Since its inception the library has been housed in numerous places including the crawl space of a university building and a wholesale grocery warehouse.
